hero.title: Welcome to LifeOS
hero.description: Your digital home for all essential functions. Organize your entire life with just one application: from passwords to finances, calendar, and more.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Discover the versatile possibilities of LifeOS
features.itemDescription1: Manage all your passwords securely in one place. We use a modern zero-knowledge method, meaning your data remains safe even in the event of a hacker attack. Only you have access to your passwords – not even we can see them. Your security is our top priority, and you can rely on that.
features.itemDescription2: Keep track of your finances: manage income and expenses, create detailed budgets, and set individual savings goals. Our budget planner helps you achieve financial freedom and ensures you always know where your money goes. Perfect for personal finances or planning larger projects.
features.itemDescription3: Never miss an important appointment, birthday, or anniversary again! Our calendar helps you effortlessly organize all your private and professional commitments. You can set reminders for events and even plan shared appointments with friends and family. Your loved ones will appreciate your perfect organization.
features.itemDescription4: Discover and share recipes in our community! Comment on your favorite recipes, try new dishes, and upload your own creations. For precise results, you can easily adjust the ingredient list to the desired number of servings – thanks to the integrated calorie and portion calculator. Whether for hobby chefs or professionals – our cookbook is your culinary companion.
features.itemDescription5: Keep track of all your tasks – whether it’s daily chores, professional projects, or long-term goals. With our task planner, you’ll never forget anything important again. Prioritize your to-dos, set deadlines, and use practical reminders to stay productive. Perfect for anyone who wants to work more efficiently and stay organized.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Create an account now and leverage the power of LifeOS to simplify your daily life.

instructions.title: What’s Next?
instructions.itemDescription1: Create an account or log in to access all the features of LifeOS. Simply click the ‘Register’ or ‘Login’ button and follow the instructions. Your personal account allows for secure and customized use of the platform.
instructions.itemDescription2: After logging in, you can choose from a variety of features designed to make your life easier. Whether you want to manage passwords securely, create a budget, or organize your day with a calendar, just select the feature you want to use and get started right away.
instructions.itemDescription3: Use our tools to securely store your personal data and structure your daily life. Enter your information, save it with a few clicks, and experience how easy it is to have everything organized and protected in one place.
